subject: Self Care
title: Weekend Habits Matter
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Weekend Habits Matter.

hook.text: Monday feels terrible because Sunday was chaotic. Your weekend habits set the tone for every workweek.

buildup.text: Social jet lag happens when weekend sleep and wake times differ drastically from weekday schedules.

discovery.text: Keeping wake times within one hour of weekdays prevents the Monday slump almost entirely.

twist.text: Complete freedom on weekends isn't rest. It's chaos. Some structure creates more genuine relaxation.

climax.text: Keep your core habits on weekends. Adjust the intensity, not the existence. Consistency protects your rhythm.

punchline.text: Weekends set the tone for Monday. Plan accordingly.

quiz.question: What is social jet lag?
options: When weekend and weekday sleep schedules differ drastically
Jet lag from traveling on weekends
